title: Fixed NoGhostBlocks playing wrong sound when placing option is enabled

body:
## Type of change

- [x ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature

## Description
Fixes the issue that when NoGhostBlocks with placing is enabled, placing blocks plays a wrong sound.

# How Has This Been Tested?
I tested it myself.


# Checklist:

- [x ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project.
- [ ] I have added comments to my code in more complex areas.
- [ ] I have tested the code in both development and production environments.
